sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Heart, Calendar, Users, Clock, Phone, MapPin, Mail } from 'lucide-react'; import { Button } from './ui/button'; import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardHeader, CardTitle } from './ui/card'; import { Badge } from './ui/badge'; const LandingPage: React.FC = () => { const services = [ { title: "General Consultation", description: "Comprehensive health check-ups and routine medical care", icon: Users, duration: "30 min" }, { title: "Emergency Care", description: "24/7 emergency medical services for urgent health issues", icon: Clock, duration: "15 min" }, { title: "Specialist Referrals", description: "Expert consultations with specialized medical professionals", icon: Heart, duration: "45 min" } ]; const staff = [ { name: "Dr. Sarah Johnson", role: "Chief Medical Officer", specialty: "Internal Medicine", experience: "15 years" }, { name: "Dr. Michael Chen", role: "Emergency Physician", specialty: "Emergency Medicine", experience: "12 years" }, { name: "Dr. Emily Rodriguez", role: "Pediatrician", specialty: "Pediatrics", experience: "8 years" } ]; return (
{/* Header */}
Hopewell Community Clinic
{/* Hero Section */}

Your Health, Our Priority

Providing compassionate, comprehensive healthcare services to our community with state-of-the-art facilities and experienced medical professionals.

{/* Services Section */}

Our Services

Comprehensive healthcare services designed to meet all your medical needs

{services.map((service, index) => (
{service.title} {service.duration}
{service.description} ))}
{/* Staff Section */}

Meet Our Team

Experienced healthcare professionals dedicated to your well-being

{staff.map((member, index) => (
{member.name} {member.role}

Specialty: {member.specialty}

Experience: {member.experience}

))}
{/* Contact Section */}

Contact Us

Get in touch with us for appointments, questions, or emergency care

Phone

(555) 123-4567

24/7 Emergency Line

 Address

123 Healthcare Ave

Medical District, MD 12345

 Email

info@hopewellclinic.com

General Inquiries
{/* Footer */}
Hopewell Community Clinic

© 2024 Hopewell Community Clinic. All rights reserved.

); }; export default LandingPage;
